definition: to dissipate the effects of alcohol/to sober up
to wake up/to be awake/to become aware/to sober up/to come to

sentences.english: Have a cup of coffee to sober you up.
I hope this coffee may sober him up.
sentences.chinese: 我希望這杯咖啡能使他醒醒酒。

sentences.english: She told us to go outside, get some air, and sober up.
sentences.chinese: 她讓我們出去透透氣，醒醒酒。

sentences.english: This article will tell you how to decant aged wine.
sentences.chinese: 本文將告訴你陳年葡萄酒如何醒酒。

sentences.english: The offender apologized when he sobered up.
Whellole she read the paper, I cleaned up the kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 她看報期間怎樣才能醒酒，我打掃庖廚。

sentences.english: Best uncork it an hour before pouring, and serve it at room temperature.
sentences.chinese: 飲用前最適宜醒酒一個小時，並置於正常室溫。

sentences.english: After you sobered up , you would be ashamed of what you did .
sentences.chinese: 你醒酒之後，會爲你的所作所爲而感到羞愧。

sentences.english: Tea can be sober enemy, this is known as the smoke.
sentences.chinese: 茶能醒酒敵煙，這也是衆所周知的事實。

sentences.english: In order to cure your hangover, you must therefore attend church as quickly as possible.
sentences.chinese: 因此，爲了醒酒，你得奔赴教堂，越快越好。

sentences.english: A good wine to decant and serve with a shoulder of lamb or roasted duck.
sentences.chinese: 飲用前適當醒酒，搭配羊肩肉或烤鴨味道鮮美。

sentences.english: If is 3 years later opens, sobers up when will not present the filtration precipitation.
sentences.chinese: 如果是3年後打開，醒酒時會出現未過濾的沉澱。

sentences.english: Uncork the bottle one hour before.
sentences.chinese: 建議醒酒一小時後飲用。

sentences.english: I need a cup of tea to sober myself up.
sentences.chinese: 我需要一杯茶來醒醒酒。

sentences.english: Should You Ever Decant White Wine?
sentences.chinese: 白葡萄酒到底需不需要醒酒？

definition: to dissipate the effects of alcohol
smell of alcohol/flavoring of rum or other liquor in food/aroma or nose (of wine)
to have one stomach's pumped/gastric lavage (medicine)
to freshen up/to be cautious or vigilant/to watch out/stimulant to enhance mental performance/stay-awake drug/agrypnotic
to detoxify/to relieve fever (in Chinese medicine)
to calm (soothe) the nerves/to relieve uneasiness of body and mind
alcohol/ethanol CH3CH2OH/ethyl alcohol/also written 乙醇/grain alcohol
